title: Backports for 1.12.3
body:
Backported PRs:
- [x] #60061 <!-- allow finding stdlibs that are normal packages in the manifest but are now stdlibs -->
- [x] #60106 <!-- RFC: Don't leave precompile-time tempdirs to be cleaned-up in binaries (#60078) -->
- [x] #60171 <!-- Add uninitialized multi-versioning trampoline for autoinit support -->
- [x] #60155 <!-- Better order for stdlibs in the Julia manual navbar -->

Need manual backport:
- [x] #59028 <!-- build: More msys2 fixes -->
- [x] #59539 <!-- doc: HISTORY: single method for multiple functions -->
- [x] #59991 <!-- cgutils: fix write barrier of atomic-setonce -->
- [x] #60041 <!-- MozillaCACerts: Update to 2025-11-04 -->
- [x] #60098 <!-- deps: fix rpath of 7z after moving to libexecdir -->

Contains multiple commits, manual intervention needed:
- [x] #57143 <!-- Add JuliaLang/JuliaSyntax.jl#525 to NEWS.md, flisp parser, and REPL -->
- [x] #58848 <!-- Set array size only when safe to do so -->
- [x] #59998 <!-- Avoid hardcoding paths in Profile and Sys -->

Non-merged PRs with backport label:
- [x] #60219 <!-- Remove list of stdlibs on the intro page -->
- [x] #60215 <!-- Bump Documenter to 1.16.1 -->
- [ ] #60121 <!-- avoid overflow when `inline_cost_threshold == typemax(Int)` -->
- [ ] #60113 <!-- some IR deserialization backwards compatibility fixes -->
- [ ] #60062 <!-- trimming: fix-up support for `Core._apply_iterate` -->
- [ ] #59914 <!-- codegen: use direct value PHI for pointer-free aggregate types -->
- [ ] #59450 <!-- Propagate Addrspaces: fix lift of memset -->
- [ ] #58359 <!-- Use dwarf for symbol lookup if dladdr fails before doing linear search. -->
- [ ] #57422 <!-- Fix performance regression in hvcat of simple matrices -->
- [ ] #55601 <!-- inference: track reaching defs for slots -->
